          <title>
            <string language="en">Diffraction of plane waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beugung der flachen Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diffraction des ondes planes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diffraction de ondas planas</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The ray diagrams demonstrate the effect of barrier gap width on the diffraction of plane waves.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Strahldiagramme zeigen den Effekt der Sperre 
Spaltbreite auf der Beugung der flachen Wellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les diagrammes de rayon démontrent l'effet de la 
largeur d'intervalle de barrière sur la diffraction des ondes planes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os diagramas do raio demonstram o efeito da 
largura de abertura da barreira no diffraction de ondas planas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli schemi del raggio dimostrano l'effetto della 
larghezza di spacco della barriera sulla diffrazione delle onde piane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα διαγράμματα ακτίνων καταδεικνύουν την επίδραση του 
πλάτους χάσματος εμποδίων στη διάθλαση των επίπεδων κυμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los diagramas del rayo demuestran el efecto de la 
anchura de boquete de la barrera en la difracción de ondas planas.</string>
          </description>
